comments: Avoid. This professor seems very pleasant and well credentialed to teach the course as a 7th Grade English teacher and Board of Ed Member in the real world. However, her grade distributions are unreasonably low and, in fact, not in keeping with the Law School\'s Policy. One can earn a B- after attending every class with perfect writing assignment

Prof. L. taught a class exempt from the Hofstra Curve in Educational Law far more rigidly than one might ever expect. Based on 3/4 "legal writing" type memoranda, scored 27/30 each, one could still wind-up with an inexplicable "C+". IN fairness, she did say that she "used her own grading curve, which was not explained. A seventh-grade teacher in
